name: Racing game (itch) (Shvap)
description: Hi, in this game there are 5 cards, which says click, on the one you have to click, everything is simple! If you click 5 times incorrectly, then you lose, and if you click correctly, then you win. It's even easier! No, no, no! Don't let them overtake you, or we'll be in trouble! Speed up!" This was a small description of the game, good luck!
